Ye are the children<S>1121</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>: ye shall not cut<S>1413</S> yourselves, nor make<S>7760</S> any baldness<S>7144</S> between your eyes<S>5869</S> for the dead<S>4191</S>.
For thou art an holy<S>6918</S> people<S>5971</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>, and the LORD<S>3068</S> hath chosen<S>977</S> thee to be a peculiar<S>5459</S> people<S>5971</S> unto himself, above all the nations<S>5971</S> that are upon<S>6440</S> the earth<S>127</S>.
Thou shalt not eat<S>398</S> any abominable thing<S>8441</S>.
These are the beasts<S>929</S> which ye shall eat<S>398</S>: the ox<S>7794</S>, the sheep<S>7716</S> <S>3775</S>, and the goat<S>5795</S>,
The hart<S>354</S>, and the roebuck<S>6643</S>, and the fallow deer<S>3180</S>, and the wild goat<S>689</S>, and the pygarg<S>1788</S>, and the wild ox<S>8377</S>, and the chamois<S>2169</S>.
And every beast<S>929</S> that parteth<S>6536</S> the hoof<S>6541</S>, and cleaveth<S>8157</S> the cleft<S>8156</S> into two<S>8147</S> claws<S>6541</S>, and cheweth<S>5927</S> the cud<S>1625</S> among the beasts<S>929</S>, that ye shall eat<S>398</S>.
Nevertheless these ye shall not eat<S>398</S> of them that chew<S>5927</S> the cud<S>1625</S>, or of them that divide<S>6536</S> the cloven<S>8156</S> hoof<S>6541</S>; as the camel<S>1581</S>, and the hare<S>768</S>, and the coney<S>8227</S>: for they chew<S>5927</S> the cud<S>1625</S>, but divide<S>6536</S> not the hoof<S>6541</S>; therefore they are unclean<S>2931</S> unto you.
And the swine<S>2386</S>, because it divideth<S>6536</S> the hoof<S>6541</S>, yet cheweth not the cud<S>1625</S>, it is unclean<S>2931</S> unto you: ye shall not eat<S>398</S> of their flesh<S>1320</S>, nor touch<S>5060</S> their dead carcase<S>5038</S>.
These ye shall eat<S>398</S> of all that are in the waters<S>4325</S>: all that have fins<S>5579</S> and scales<S>7193</S> shall ye eat<S>398</S>:
And whatsoever hath not fins<S>5579</S> and scales<S>7193</S> ye may not eat<S>398</S>; it is unclean<S>2931</S> unto you.
Of all clean<S>2889</S> birds<S>6833</S> ye shall eat<S>398</S>.
But these are they of which ye shall not eat<S>398</S>: the eagle<S>5404</S>, and the ossifrage<S>6538</S>, and the ospray<S>5822</S>,
And the glede<S>7201</S>, and the kite<S>344</S>, and the vulture<S>1772</S> after his kind<S>4327</S>,
And every raven<S>6158</S> after his kind<S>4327</S>,
And the owl<S>1323</S> <S>3284</S>, and the night hawk<S>8464</S>, and the cuckow<S>7828</S>, and the hawk<S>5322</S> after his kind<S>4327</S>,
The little owl<S>3563</S>, and the great owl<S>3244</S>, and the swan<S>8580</S>,
And the pelican<S>6893</S>, and the gier eagle<S>7360</S>, and the cormorant<S>7994</S>,
And the stork<S>2624</S>, and the heron<S>601</S> after her kind<S>4327</S>, and the lapwing<S>1744</S>, and the bat<S>5847</S>.
And every creeping thing<S>8318</S> that flieth<S>5775</S> is unclean<S>2931</S> unto you: they shall not be eaten<S>398</S>.
But of all clean<S>2889</S> fowls<S>5775</S> ye may eat<S>398</S>.
Ye shall not eat<S>398</S> of any thing that dieth of itself<S>5038</S>: thou shalt give<S>5414</S> it unto the stranger<S>1616</S> that is in thy gates<S>8179</S>, that he may eat<S>398</S> it; or thou mayest sell<S>4376</S> it unto an alien<S>5237</S>: for thou art an holy<S>6918</S> people<S>5971</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>. Thou shalt not seethe<S>1310</S> a kid<S>1423</S> in his mother's<S>517</S> milk<S>2461</S>.
Thou shalt truly<S>6237</S> tithe<S>6237</S> all the increase<S>8393</S> of thy seed<S>2233</S>, that the field<S>7704</S> bringeth forth<S>3318</S> year<S>8141</S> by year<S>8141</S>.
And thou shalt eat<S>398</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>, in the place<S>4725</S> which he shall choose<S>977</S> to place<S>7931</S> his name<S>8034</S> there, the tithe<S>4643</S> of thy corn<S>1715</S>, of thy wine<S>8492</S>, and of thine oil<S>3323</S>, and the firstlings<S>1062</S> of thy herds<S>1241</S> and of thy flocks<S>6629</S>; that thou mayest learn<S>3925</S> to fear<S>3372</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> always<S>3117</S>.
And if the way<S>1870</S> be too long<S>7235</S> for thee, so that<S>3588</S> thou art not able<S>3201</S> to carry<S>5375</S> it; or if the place<S>4725</S> be too far<S>7368</S> from thee, which the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall choose<S>977</S> to set<S>7760</S> his name<S>8034</S> there, when the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> hath blessed<S>1288</S> thee:
Then shalt thou turn<S>5414</S> it into money<S>3701</S>, and bind up<S>6696</S> the money<S>3701</S> in thine hand<S>3027</S>, and shalt go<S>1980</S> unto the place<S>4725</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> shall choose<S>977</S>:
And thou shalt bestow<S>5414</S> that money<S>3701</S> for whatsoever thy soul<S>5315</S> lusteth after<S>183</S>, for oxen<S>1241</S>, or for sheep<S>6629</S>, or for wine<S>3196</S>, or for strong drink<S>7941</S>, or for whatsoever thy soul<S>5315</S> desireth<S>7592</S>: and thou shalt eat<S>398</S> there before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S>, and thou shalt rejoice<S>8055</S>, thou, and thine household<S>1004</S>, <sup>desireth: Heb. asketh of thee</sup>
And the Levite<S>3881</S> that is within thy gates<S>8179</S>; thou shalt not forsake<S>5800</S> him; for he hath no part<S>2506</S> nor inheritance<S>5159</S> with thee.
At the end<S>7097</S> of three<S>7969</S> years<S>8141</S> thou shalt bring forth<S>3318</S> all the tithe<S>4643</S> of thine increase<S>8393</S> the same year<S>8141</S>, and shalt lay it up<S>3240</S> within thy gates<S>8179</S>:
And the Levite<S>3881</S>, (because he hath no part<S>2506</S> nor inheritance<S>5159</S> with thee,) and the stranger<S>1616</S>, and the fatherless<S>3490</S>, and the widow<S>490</S>, which are within thy gates<S>8179</S>, shall come<S>935</S>, and shall eat<S>398</S> and be satisfied<S>7646</S>; that the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> may bless<S>1288</S> thee in all the work<S>4639</S> of thine hand<S>3027</S> which thou doest<S>6213</S>.
